title: How to Activate Quest?
body: SO I see this Baron merch quest, but I'm on the beta client... where is the quest button to activate it? I just had  a win with Baron kill and I would have liked to be able to activate the quest...

replies.body: You should be able to do it by directly going to the [Baron Quest](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/landing/2016/battle-for-baron#r-key).  Scroll to the bottom where it says "Login to activate!"  I believe this is where the portion of the client would have sent you, and you can always double check by launching the legacy client.  I hope that helps!

it did, thank you...
disappointing that I missed out on credit for yesterday's game due to looking in the wrong place.
